text.autoconfig.paintings.option.use_van: Pick true to only use the vanilla paintings and skip loading any other paintings
text.autoconfig.paintings.option.use_sel: Pick true to enable the Painting Selection Gui tot pop up when placing a painting
text.autoconfig.paintings.option.cycle_p: Pick True to enable painting cycling on right click with a painting item
text.autoconfig.paintings.option.show_pa: Pick True to show the size of paintings in the painting gui
